name: Product Design System template
description:
Meet Product Design System, a template at Figma

This is my first template at the community. Lots of work goes here! Its name's Product Design System. If you use it, please attribute it. Thanks to @CarlUX for the rich text and password input design.


Newest version codename: 1.0.0

Releases

  • 1.0.0 to 1.0.1: Update, add most components. Publish to the Figma community.


Additional information

This file has interactive components! To ensure they work in the Product Design System, join the beta â†’
